about_the_game:
What is Shenaniganza?


Shenaniganza is a videogame interpretation and remake of the real world game "manhunt". Manhunt is alike hide-and-seek, but with a thrilling twist. The Hiders become seekers! In the game you will find wacky powerups and silly skins that let you express your inner silly Billy!

Abilities
In Shenaniganza, there are several abilities, deploy a heat seeking monkey to find the seekers or weaponize the local banana supply and stun the seekers!

Map Features
Across the map you will find portals and other interactable mobility objects such as cannons. Use these to escape sticky situations and throw the seekers off course!

Matchmaking
Shenaniganza features a lobby based matchmaking system, you can either join private games through codes supplied by the game upon lobby creation, or you can choose to quick join a game / choose a public lobby from the lobby selection screen.

What is Shenaniganza?


Shenaniganza is a videogame interpretation and remake of the real world game "manhunt". Manhunt is alike hide-and-seek, but with a thrilling twist. The Hiders become seekers! In the game you will find wacky powerups and silly skins that let you express your inner silly Billy!

Abilities
In Shenaniganza, there are several abilities, deploy a heat seeking monkey to find the seekers or weaponize the local banana supply and stun the seekers!

Map Features
Across the map you will find portals and other interactable mobility objects such as cannons. Use these to escape sticky situations and throw the seekers off course!

Matchmaking
Shenaniganza features a lobby based matchmaking system, you can either join private games through codes supplied by the game upon lobby creation, or you can choose to quick join a game / choose a public lobby from the lobby selection screen.
name: Shenaniganza

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews:
“We got Shenaniganza before GTA6”
10/10 – JettAndBros

“9/10 doctors recommend”
69/69 – Anonymous Monkey

“I Shenaniganza'd all over myself”
420/69 – MonkeysRsexy22
short_description: Outsmart friends in goofy hide-and-seek with crazy power-ups, vibrant cartoon aesthetics, and endless laughter. Form alliances, betray buddies, and experience multiplayer mayhem in this unpredictable, entertaining game. Get ready for a bonanza of fun – where laughs never stop!
